caption.p: Greenhouse experiment showed the effect of two most potent endophytic bacterial isolates and their consortium on growth performance of Zea mays L. plant. ( A) Control; ( B) Zea mays seeds inoculated with Bacillus cereus PI-8; ( C) Zea mays seeds inoculated with Bacillus subtilis PI-10; ( D) Zea mays seeds inoculated by bacterial consortium.
